sprite

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • sprite.Sprite
      • sprite.Player

  • public class Player
extends Sprite
    Class that represents a player in EcoWars. Can move, stores current balance, and deals with collision.
    Author:
    Nir Reiter

      Height of a Player (both sprite and collision)

      Width of a Player (both sprite and collision)

      • update

        public void update(DrawingSurface game)
        Description copied from class: Sprite
        Should be called every frame by the game. Moves the Sprite by its velocity.
        Overrides:
        update in class Sprite
        Parameters:
        game - The DrawingSurface that the player is located on.
